title: Slow cooker coq au vin
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 onion, chopped', '12 whole baby onions', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '1.8kg chicken thighs', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '55g butter', '110g bacon, chopped', '300g mushrooms, sliced', '2 carrots', '2 sticks celery', '1/2 bottle red wine', '450ml chicken stock', '1 bouquet garni', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
